original_title: James Salter: A Sport and a Pastime
overview: This 54-minute documentary traces the writer James Salter's lifelong love affair with France, unforgettably expressed in his 1967 masterpiece, A Sport and a Pastime.  Salter's own reflections on his writing and life offer rich insights for reader and writer alike.
title: James Salter: A Sport and a Pastime
